com.vjmp.editor
Class MapEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          com.vjmp.editor.MapEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MapEditor
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Az map szerkesztõ fõosztálya. Felelõs a futtatásért, illetve a Swing gui megalkotásáért. Extendeli a Canvas-t, implementálja a Runnable, ActionListener interfaceket.

See Also:
Serialized Form
